data.eml:eml: A review of Peratophyga Warren, 1894 in China, with descriptions of two new species (Lepidoptera: Geometridae, Ennominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiang, Nan, Xue, Dayong, Han, Hongxiang (2012): A review of Peratophyga Warren, 1894 in China, with descriptions of two new species (Lepidoptera: Geometridae, Ennominae). Zootaxa 3478: 403-415, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282291
